body:
Add early support for ROCM on AMD GPUs, for develop branch only.
Requires ROCM packages to be specified as external packages.

----------

No, it doesn't work to add ROCmPackage.  That adds dependencies for
hip, hsa-rocr-dev and llvm-amdgpu.

Hpctoolkit is not a ROCM application, it is a tool for analyzing apps.
For ROCM, we need hip, rocm-dbgapi and roctracer-dev.
title: hpctoolkit: add variant to support rocm
